content: Other times, these detonations can trigger a series of lightning bolts to explode outward around him, both spreading in a line from his strikes and also seeking you out.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellowbrow.md', within the main section titled 'Yellowbrow', specifically from the subsection 'Yellowbrow Boss Fight (Second Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Other times, these detonations can trigger a series of lightning bolts to explode outward around him, both spreading in a line from his strikes and also seeking you out.
